comprehensive_overview: The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++ programmers. It provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as special functions, linear algebra, interpolation, numerical integration, random numbers, and more.
core_features:
1. Implementation of a comprehensive set of mathematical functions
2. High-performance numerical routines
3. Modular structure for easy integration into C and C++ applications
4. Extensive documentation and examples
5. Open-source and free to use
